entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:48 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
